Hi,

I'am using Fedora 8 and Heritrix 1.12.1 and everytime I need to update=
 
a customized jar (processor), I must restart the machine. It look like 
t=
he jar once loaded from the GUI modules configuration of a profile, it 
is =
cached and even a new version of the jar is copied over, won't see 
it unle=
ss the machine is rebooted.

What I did:
I created a java class processor, =
created a directory "Modules", a 
file "Processor.options" in that director=
y and added a line to identify 
my processor. That part is working fine.

T=
hanks

Allen
